"Emergency Quest Password Matchmaking":
"\"Password Matchmaking\" is a function that allows you to set a password so that you will only be matched up with other players who have set the same password.

From \"Quest Information\", select \"Depart Immediately\" and set a password in \"Password Input\"."

"If you want to switch back from Password Matchmaking to normal matchmaking, open the menu, select \"Communication\", then \"Party Commands\".

If you remove the password from your party settings and apply the change, you will return to normal matchmaking."
